Package com.game8.client.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ControllerUtility
    Utility methods for Controller classes This class contains the utility functions used in Controller classes.
    CreditsController
    This class is responsible for controlling the Credits page
    GameWon  
    HighScoresController
    HighScore screen controller This class is responsible for handling the interactions between the user and the HighScore screen.
    LoginRegisterController
    Login and Register screen controller This class is responsible for handling the interactions between the user and the Login and Register screens.
    MainMenuController
    Main Menu screen controller This class is responsible for handling the interactions between the user and the Main Menu screen.
